title: Ramy on Mia Khalifa, Smashing Cousins & Aliens Building the Pyramids
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary:
Ramy Youssef from the hit Hulu show "Ramy" is here to educate Andrew Schulz on Christian Muslims, smashing your cousin, and who REALLY built the Egyptian pyramids. INDULGE!

00:00 - Ramy - Andrew’s new, favorite show
01:46 - Ramy Mexican Golden Doodle

28:44 - We need Puerto Rican shows

34:41 - Impact of representation

42:49 - Experiences with psychedelics

49:34 - Serving others will settle everything
